geometry.planar

Class PolylineArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.PolylineArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Area, java.io.Serializable

    public class PolylineArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements Area, java.io.Serializable
    A PolylineArea is an Area, where the outside border curve and the hole borders consist of straight lines.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • split_to_convex

        public TileShape[] split_to_convex()
        Splits this polygon shape with holes into convex pieces. The result is not exact, because rounded intersections of lines are used in the result pieces. It can be made exact, if Polylines are returned instead of Polygons, so that no intersection points are needed in the result.
        Specified by:
        split_to_convex in interface Area
        Returns:
        an array of TileShape objects.

      • split_to_convex

        public TileShape[] split_to_convex(Stoppable p_stoppable_thread)
        Splits this polygon shape with holes into convex pieces. The result is not exact, because rounded intersections of lines are used in the result pieces. It can be made exact, if Polylines are returned instead of Polygons, so that no intersection points are needed in the result. If p_stoppable_thread != null, this function can be interrupted.
        Parameters:
        p_stoppable_thread - a Stoppable object.
        Returns:
        an array of TileShape objects.

      • turn_90_degree

      • rotate_approx

        public PolylineArea rotate_approx(double p_angle,
                                  FloatPoint p_pole)
        Rotates the area around p_pole by p_angle. The result may be not exact.
        Specified by:
        rotate_approx in interface Area
        Parameters:
